REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f3620 reute b f BC-/-FED-ADDS-RESERVES-V 06-18 0055

TEXT.TITLE: FED ADDS RESERVES VIA CUSTOMER REPURCHASES
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve entered the government securities market to supply temporary reserves indirectly via two billion dlrs of customer repurchase agreements, a spokesman for the New York Fed said. Fed funds were trading at 6-3/4 pct when the Fed began its action. Reuter
